name: typespec-test
description: TypeSpecを使用したWeb開発プロジェクト

scripts.generate:all: docker-compose exec typespec npm run typespec:compile && docker-compose exec generator python generator/main.py --target all
scripts.generate:csv: docker-compose exec generator python generator/main.py --target csv
scripts.generate:ddl: docker-compose exec generator python generator/main.py --target ddl
scripts.generate:backend: docker-compose exec generator python generator/main.py --target spring
scripts.generate:frontend: docker-compose exec generator python generator/main.py --target angular
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:temp && npm run clean:csv && npm run clean:ddl && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
